reviews.course_name: BC3120 Litany for Survival: Lesbian Texts
reviews.review_content:
Professor wiesen makes me nervous. she is always so unsure of herself and looks like she's going to melt into the table. sometimes she has trouble speaking coherently. otherwise, i really enjoyed this class. the readings were excellent and the discussions were interesting, when they actually happened. sometimes things are awkward because professor wiesen always focuses the discussion on personal disclosures. if you want an A in this class, you must disclose, disclose, disclose.
Workload:
a few small papers and one big paper on any subject that has anything to do with lesbians, women, gender, cats, whatever.
